info.title: Yoll API
info.description: Yoll API provides real multi-domain services allowing students to integrate it in their projects.

get.description: Returns a list of all users. **Requires header**: X-Secret-Token

post.description: Creates a user with name and email.

400.description: Invalid input data (e.g., invalid email format)

get.description: Fetches a single user based on their ID.

put.description: Updates the name and email of a user.

get.summary: Retrieve all movies for a user
get.description: Returns a list of movies for the specified user. (Requires query parameter user_id)

200.description: Successful response with a list of movies

400.description: User ID is required as a query parameter

error.example: User ID is required as a query parameter

404.description: No movies found for this user

error.example: No movies found for this user

post.description: Creates a movie with title, genre, release_year, and user_id.

delete.description: Deletes a movie by its ID for the specified user.

400.description: User ID is required to delete a movie

error.example: User ID is required as a query parameter

404.description: Movie not found or does not belong to this user

error.example: Movie not found or does not belong to this user

get.summary: Retrieve all todos for a user
get.description: Returns a list of all todos for the specified user.

400.description: Bad Request: user_id query parameter is required

error.example: user_id is required as a query parameter: /todos?user_id=<user_id>

404.description: No todos found for the given user

error.example: No todos found for this user_id=1

post.description: Creates a new todo with a title, completed status, and user_id for a specific user.

400.description: Bad Request: Missing required fields or an internal error occurred

error.example: Fields title and user_id are required

get.description: Fetches a single todo for the specified user.

put.description: Updates the title and/or completed status of a todo for the specified user.

404.description: Todo not found or update failed

error.example: Todo with id=1 not found or update failed

delete.description: Deletes a todo for the specified user.

404.description: Todo not found or does not belong to this user

error.example: Todo with id=1 not found or does not belong to this user

post.summary: Create a new contact for a user
post.description: Creates a new contact. The request body must include the user_id and full_name along with any other contact details.

400.description: Invalid input data (e.g., missing user_id or full_name)

get.summary: Retrieve all contacts for a user
get.description: Returns a list of contacts for the specified user. The user_id must be provided as a query parameter.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: ID of the user whose contacts are to be retrieved

error.example: user_id is required as a query parameter

get.description: Fetches detailed information for a specific contact that belongs to the given user.

error.example: user_id is required as a query parameter

404.description: Contact not found or does not belong to this user

put.description: Updates the details of a contact. The request body must include user_id (to verify ownership) along with any updated fields.

400.description: Invalid input data or missing user_id

error.example: user_id is required as a query parameter

404.description: Contact not found or does not belong to the user

delete.description: Deletes a contact. The user_id must be provided as a query parameter to ensure the contact belongs to the user.

404.description: Contact not found or does not belong to the user

post.description: Marks a contact as favorite by updating its is_favorite flag and adding a record to the favorites table. The user_id must be provided as a query parameter, and the request body must include the contact_id.

400.description: Invalid input data or missing user_id

error.example: user_id is required as a query parameter

get.summary: Retrieve favorite contacts for a user
get.description: Returns a list of favorite contacts for the specified user. The user_id must be provided as a query parameter.

parameters.name: contact_id
parameters.description: ID of the contact to remove from favorites

delete.description: Removes the favorite status from a contact by updating its is_favorite flag to false and deleting the record from the favorites table.
